reviews.review_msg: 3 group projects, first time for her teaching HSCI 100, long long long lectures, boring lectures, horrible lecture notes. What else can be said? Oh for some reason.. every single question she gives is about hormones. Expect to read your textbook to learn instead. Classes are useless except for iClicker participation which she forces. Not take again

She was really knowledgable about the material, but her lectures were really long and super boring. Her monotone voice nearly put me to sleep every lecture. Lectures weren't mandatory, though, because she recorded and posted her lecture along with the slides. She does have iclicker participation.
